pr_title: HDDS-4292. Ozone Client not working with Hadoop Version < 3.2

timeline.message: HDDS-4292. Ozone Client not working with Hadoop Version < 3.2

timeline.bodyText:
This should be
ProxyInfo will not be set?
timeline.author: vivekratnavel

replies.bodyText:
It will be set when we make a first-time call to the server.
getProxy() is called when first-time submitRequest is called.
replies.author: bharatviswa504
